mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.InvalidProjectionException
mdException.label: Invalid Projection Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a trying to import a shapefile which is not in 4326
mdException.message: Shapefile must have the EPSG:4236 projection

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.UnableToReadProjectionException
mdException.label: Unable To Read Projection Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a trying to import a shapefile which does not include projection information
mdException.message: Unable to read projection information from the shapefile. Please ensure the shapefile zip includes a prj file
